scripts.start: npm run jade && npm run serve
scripts.serve: budo src/coffee/main.coffee:main.js --dir dest --live -v -- -t coffeeify -t stylify --extension='.coffee' | opnr | garnish
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dest/main.js -m -c warnings=false --comments '/This header is generated by licensify \(https://github\.com/twada/licensify\)/' -o dest/main.min.js
scripts.build: npm run jade && npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run replace-min
scripts.deploy: git subtree push -P dest origin gh-pages --squash
